Text.Name: Ls_School_Panda
Text.Desc: Panda Xianxian has tried and improved our relation with [SCHOOL].

Text.Name: Ls_FindPanda
Text.Desc: It is said there is a strange jade inside the Great Bamboo Forest. It is half white and half black, like the Panda's lagacy in talse.

Text.Name: Ls_CallPanda
Text.Desc: This jade contains two kind of breath, a Yin and a Yang. They combined with each other, cute and ancient.

Text.Name: Little_Panda
Text.Desc: Another panda Xiuxiu came here after hearing the voice of Xianxian!
